experience.title: Associate - Founder's office
experience.description: -Analyzed quantitative impact from 4 brand partnerships and used that data to guide marketing and product strategies by scaling it further to 20 in the span of six months.-Designed merchandising strategies for the existing products based on regression analysis identifying key store attributes to increase conversion by 18%.-Managed end-to-end influencer marketing campaign, resulting to 4x growth in traffic and 32% increase in conversion.

experience.title: Summer Intern
experience.description: -Generated workable insights on different companies by assisting portfolio managers in analyzing stocks and mutual funds for prospective and existing clients.-Collaborated in the making of financial models and drafted a report on TMT (Technology, Media, and Telecommunication) sector.-Participated in client financial planning discussions and quarterly portfolio reviews.-1/4 selected among 240 applicants.

experience.title: Creative Agency
experience.description: Witnessed the rise of creator economy during early covid. Worked closely with top-notch influencers and helped them curate their content with the current trends.
